casebody.data:
Richard C. HVIZDAK, Petitioner
v.
Douglas G. LINN, Esquire, Jennifer R. Linn, Esquire, Linn Law Group and Michele M. Hvizdak, Respondents No. 370 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 13, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 13th day of March, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.

Justice Wecht did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
